nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hello Person1,    I had the EBUS procedure yesterday and I now scheduled to begin radiation therapy on MM/DD/YYYY for five sessions. Should we bring forward the PET scans planned for MM/DD/YYYY or defer them until after the treatment has ended? I trying to plan a visit to LOCATION for a month or two as soon after the treatment has ended but not sure what we going to be doing about scans now. Thank you,  Person2
